mean_en: "(of sounds) very pleasant when played or sung together; arranged together in a pleasing way so that each part goes well with the other; (of relationships
sentence: The sounds of their instruments blended into a harmonious whole.
sentence_trans: 他们的乐器声混在一起非常悦耳。
word_etyma: harmon(y)和谐 + ious形容词后缀 → harmonious和谐的
